title: Identify the porcessor type of a binary
content: There are different ways to identify the processor type such as using IDA or file  command in Linux.  But sometimes the processor type is not detected by these tools. Besides I do not have the correct processor type of the binary. Is there any way to detect the correct type of processor?

answers_data.content:
you might try cpu_rec, it claims to be able to identify a wide variety of architectures by analyzing the raw binary data.
According to cpu_rec github repository : Known architectures in the default corpus
68HC08
68HC11
8051
Alpha
ARcompact
ARM64 ARMeb ARMel ARMhf
AVR
AxisCris
Blackfin
Cell-SPU
CLIPPER
CompactRISC
Cray
Epiphany
FR-V
FR30
FT32
H8-300
HP-Focus
HP-PA
i860

IQ2000

M32R
M68k
M88k

Mico32

MIPS16 MIPSeb MIPSel
MMIX

Moxie
